data.text:
I had promised Maruzensky to accompany her 
for horseshoe shopping, but our meeting time 
came, and there was no sign of her…
data.processed:
󠁿I had promised Maruzensky to accompany her 
󠁿for horseshoe shopping, but our meeting time 
󠁿came, and there was no sign of her…

data.text:
I couldn't reach her phone, so I decided 
to check up on her at her place.
data.processed:
󠁿I couldn't reach her phone, so I decided 
󠁿to check up on her at her place.

data.text:
I-I'll be right there…! Oh dear, is that another package? 
I'm sorry, give me a min—… uaaaaah!?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿I-I'll be right there…! Oh dear, is that another package? 
󠁿I'm sorry, give me a min—… uaaaaah!?

data.text:
I heard a loud noise accompanied by Maruzensky's scream, 
and instinctively opened the door.
data.processed:
󠁿I heard a loud noise accompanied by Maruzensky's scream, 
󠁿and instinctively opened the door.

data.text: … There, buried in cardboard, laid Maruzensky.
data.processed: 󠁿… There, buried in cardboard, laid Maruzensky.

data.text: … Sorry for startling you earlier.
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: Why was there a mountain of cardboard…
choices.processed: <size=40>Why was there a mountain of cardboard…</size>

data.processed: 󠁿… Sorry for startling you earlier.

data.text:
You know how when you order online, it arrives in cardboard 
boxes? And, umm… they don't disappear on their own?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿You know how when you order online, it arrives in cardboard 
󠁿boxes? And, umm… they don't disappear on their own?

data.text: You know…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿You know…

data.text:
… Ugh! Fine, I haven't gotten around to cleaning up! 
It was all packages you saw…!
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I take it tidying up isn't your forte?

data.processed:
󠁿… Ugh! Fine, I haven't gotten around to cleaning up! 
󠁿It was all packages you saw…!

data.text: Ummm… how do I put it.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Ummm… how do I put it.

data.text:
I can get all stoked for it when I have guests over, you know? 
Then I'm cleaning every nook and cranny.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿I can get all stoked for it when I have guests over, you know? 
󠁿Then I'm cleaning every nook and cranny.

data.text: But when I'm alone, I just can't get in the groove…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿But when I'm alone, I just can't get in the groove…

data.text:
This morning I dropped my cell somewhere on cardboard mountain, 
and I was looking for it when you came over…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿This morning I dropped my cell somewhere on cardboard mountain, 
󠁿and I was looking for it when you came over…

data.text:
This morning I dropped my cell somewhere on cardboard mountain, 
and I was looking for it when you came over…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿This morning I dropped my cell somewhere on cardboard mountain, 
󠁿and I was looking for it when you came over…

data.text:
I can't believe you saw that mess on top of me being late. 
Haa, I should keep the place tidy…
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: I'll help you tidy it up.

data.processed:
󠁿I can't believe you saw that mess on top of me being late. 
󠁿Haa, I should keep the place tidy…

data.text: Wha!? My place? Are you sure?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: It's more fun with two, right?
It's more fun with two, right?

data.processed: 󠁿Wha!? My place? Are you sure?

data.text: … Yeah. If you're down with it, then I'm down with it!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿… Yeah. If you're down with it, then I'm down with it!

data.text: … Yeah. If you're down with it, then let's jive!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿… Yeah. If you're down with it, then let's jive!

data.text: Thankies♪ Let's go, trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Thankies♪ Let's go, trainer!

data.text: Thankies♪ Let's go, trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Thankies♪ Let's go, trainer!

data.text:
We went back to her place and for a few hours, packages were 
sorted and cardboard put in piles.
data.processed:
󠁿We went back to her place and for a few hours, packages were 
󠁿sorted and cardboard put in piles.

data.text: Thanks, trainer! It's so much nicer now!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Thanks, trainer! It's so much nicer now!

data.text: Thanks, trainer! It's so much more refreshing now!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Thanks, trainer! It's so much more refreshing now!

data.text:
I'll treat you to whatever you want 
in return. Don't be shy♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿I'll treat you to whatever you want 
󠁿in return. Don't be shy♪

data.text:
In fact, why don't I make you something myself? This morning 
aside, I can whip up a mean plate!
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: So cooking you do feel like?

data.processed:
󠁿In fact, why don't I make you something myself? This morning 
󠁿aside, I can whip up a mean plate!

data.text:
Mmm～ about as much as I clean. It's hard to 
feel like it when I'm alone, same thing.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Mmm～ about as much as I clean. It's hard to 
󠁿feel like it when I'm alone, same thing.

data.text:
But today, you're here! So what would you like? 
Eastern, Western, just say the word♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿But today, you're here! So what would you like? 
󠁿Eastern, Western, just say the word♪

data.text:
But today, you're here! So what would you like? 
Eastern, Western, just say the word♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿But today, you're here! So what would you like? 
󠁿Eastern, Western, just say the word♪

data.text: I'm going to go all out, look forward to it!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿I'm going to go all out, look forward to it!

data.text:
Having gone out of her way to even buy new seasonings, Maruzensky 
started on dinner. She wasn't kidding about her cooking skills, 
and one by one dishes appeared—
data.processed:
󠁿Having gone out of her way to even buy new seasonings, Maruzensky 
󠁿started on dinner. She wasn't kidding about her cooking skills, 
󠁿and one by one dishes appeared—

data.text:
Neither presentation nor taste would 
be out of place in a restaurant!
data.processed:
󠁿Neither presentation nor taste would 
󠁿be out of place in a restaurant!

data.text: Whoo! That was great. What did you think, are you satisfied?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Whoo! That was great. What did you think, are you satisfied?

data.text: Whoo! That was great. What did you think, are you satisfied?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Whoo! That was great. What did you think, are you satisfied?

data.text: Hehehe, great♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Hehehe, great♪

data.text:
You helped me out so much today and I'm still regretting this 
morning, so I wanted to make it up to you.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿You helped me out so much today and I'm still regretting this 
󠁿morning, so I wanted to make it up to you.

data.text:
You helped me out so much today and I'm still ashamed of this 
morning, so I wanted to make it up to you.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿You helped me out so much today and I'm still ashamed of this 
󠁿morning, so I wanted to make it up to you.

data.text: I'm so relieved you liked it! Now I just need to—
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿I'm so relieved you liked it! Now I just need to—

data.text: … make sure that those packages don't become a problem again.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿… make sure that those packages don't become a problem again.

data.text:
But that's the hard part, isn't it～? 
How do I get motivated to tidy up?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿But that's the hard part, isn't it～? 
󠁿How do I get motivated to tidy up?

data.text:
I don't mind it, but I can't bring myself to 
just do it like I can running or dancing.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿I don't mind it, but I can't bring myself to 
󠁿just do it like I can running or dancing.

data.text:
… Oh! How about you drop by to check on me 
once in a while? Wouldn't that work?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿… Oh! How about you drop by to check on me 
󠁿once in a while? Wouldn't that work?

data.text:
… Oh! How about you drop by to check on me 
once in a while? Wouldn't that work?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿… Oh! How about you drop by to check on me 
󠁿once in a while? Wouldn't that work?

data.text: Really? Then in return… I'll treat you to home-cooked meals♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Really? Then in return… I'll treat you to home-cooked meals♪

data.text: You dropping by, and cooking for you means…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿You dropping by, and cooking for you means…

data.text: You dropping by, and cooking for you means…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿You dropping by, and cooking for you means…

data.text: I can keep my place neat, and we can enjoy meals together!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿I can keep my place neat, and we can enjoy meals together!

data.text:
I'm so happy. Motivation aside, eating alone 
is so dull I couldn't enjoy the taste!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿I'm so happy. Motivation aside, eating alone 
󠁿is so dull I couldn't enjoy the taste!

data.text: Problems solved and fun times ahead! Thanks, trainer♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Problems solved and fun times ahead! Thanks, trainer♪

data.text: Problems solved and fun times ahead! Thanks, trainer♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Problems solved and fun times ahead! Thanks, trainer♪

data.text: Well, it's about time to go home.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Well, it's about time to go home.

data.text: … We tidied up together and ate dinner together.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿… We tidied up together and ate dinner together.

data.text:
It doesn't sound like much but I really enjoyed our time. I 
already can't wait to do it again!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿It doesn't sound like much but I really enjoyed our time. I 
󠁿already can't wait to do it again!

data.text:
Hmhm. I really shouldn't be happy for someone 
to come checking my place for clutter.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Hmhm. I really shouldn't be happy for someone 
󠁿to come checking my place for clutter.

data.text:
… I know! Why don't you just move in next door? You wouldn't have 
to go back and forth to drop by… Cool?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿… I know! Why don't you just move in next door? You wouldn't have 
󠁿to go back and forth to drop by… Cool?

data.text:
I'm pretty sure the room next door is vacant 
right now, I'll go check it out!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿I'm pretty sure the room next door is vacant 
󠁿right now, I'll go check it out!

data.text: Aww, boo♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Aww, boo♪

data.text: … Hehe. Oh you're so cute getting all flustered, trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿… Hehe. Oh you're so cute getting all flustered, trainer!

data.text: … Hehe. Oh you're so cute getting all flustered, trainer!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿… Hehe. Oh you're so cute getting all flustered, trainer!

data.text:
Well anyway… 
I'd be happy for you to drop by whenever.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
󠁿Well anyway… 
󠁿I'd be happy for you to drop by whenever.

data.text: Even every day… ♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: 󠁿Even every day… ♪

data.text:
With a mischievous smile, Maruzensky got 
into her beloved car and drove off…

󠁿With a mischievous smile, Maruzensky got
